JUDGES: Javier Borrego Borrego;Margarita Tsatsa-Nikolovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Snejana Botoucharova;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , in the PERSON region of GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( NORP міський суд PERSON області ) awarded the applicant CARDINAL hryvnyas ( ORG ) against his former NORP employer , the ORG - owned ORG Mine “ PERSON ” ( CARDINAL відкрите акціонерне товариство « Шахта ім. Дзержинського » ) , in disability benefits and other payments .
CARDINAL . This judgment was not appealed against , became final , and enforcement proceedings were instituted to collect the debt .
CARDINAL . The debt was paid to the applicant in numerous small instalments , the last payment of ORG CARDINAL having been made on DATE .

CARDINAL . As explained by the bailiffs ' service , the enforcement of the judgment had been delayed on account of numerous reasons , including a prolonged reorganization of the debtor , insufficient funds and a tax lien imposed on its property , as well as a statutory moratorium on the forced sale of the ORG property .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment in the case of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
